Keberadaan Tim Akselerasi Pembangunan dan Jabar Juara Harus Dievaluasi Gubernur Jabar
04 Nov 2019, 08:11 by Ecep Sukirman
BANDUNG, (PR).- Keberadaan Tim Akselerasi Pembangunan (TAP) dan Tim Akselerasi Jabar Juara (TAJJ) yang dibentuk Gubernur Ridwan Kamil, harus dievaluasi. Hal itu seiring dengan menyeruaknya isu interpelasi yang bergulir di kalangan Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Daerah (DPRD) Jawa Barat saat ini.
Demikian diungkapkan anggota DPRD Jawa Barat Bucky Wibawa Karya Guna seusai menggelar diskusi publik di Jalan Tubagus Ismail VIII Kota Bandung, Senin, 4 November 2019. Diskusi publik yang semula digelar dengan beberapa anggota DPRD Jawa Barat seperti Ketua Fraksi Partai Demokrat DPRD Jawa Barat Asep Wahyuwijaya, Ketua Fraksi Nasdem Persatuan Indonesia Tia Fitriani, Wakil Ketua DPRD Jawa Barat Oleh Soleh, termasuk dengan Ketua Harian TAP Jawa Barat Arfi Rafnialdi, hanya dihadiri beberapa narasumber.
Ketidakhadiran narasumber lainnya dari DPRD Jawa Barat diduga berhalangan hadir, demikian juga dengan Ketua Harian TAP Jawa Barat. Diskusi itu digelar terkait dengan pandangan wacana penggunaan hak interpelasi di kalangan DPRD Jawa Barat yang menyoroti kinerja Gubernur Jawa Barat Ridwan Kamil, termasuk keberadaan TAP dan TAJJ yang direkrut dalam menjalankan roda pemerintahan Ridwan Kamil.
“Jika dalam perjalannya terjadi semacam ada distorsi di tupoksi TAP dan TAJJ, misalnya ada temuan di lapangan terjadi penyalahgunaan kewenangan, saya kira tidak sungkan-sungkan kami akan menyampaikan itu ke gubernur. Saya kira (keberadaan TAP dan TAJJ) memang harus dievaluasi gubernur dengan menyeruaknya isu interpelasi ini,” ujar Bucky.
Disinggung mengenai keseriusan DPRD Jawa Barat menggunakan hak interpelasinya kepada Gubernur Jawa Barat ini, Bucky mengaku pihaknya tidak mengetahui secara detail hal itu. Dia beralasan dirinya merupakan anggota DPRD Jawa Barat baru, sedangkan isu interpelasi ini sudah bergulir sejak 1 tahun terakhir DPRD Jawa Barat periode 2014-2019.
“Jadi kalau saya memang masih baru (menjabat DPRD Jabar) dan harus menelusuri dulu akar permasalahannya dari periode lalu itu sampai sekarang. Kalau itu menyangkut masalah TAP dan TAJJ, jadi ya kita juga harus mempelajari dulu. Saya tidak tahu apakah itu hanya wacana atau akan digulirkan. Karena itu kan (hak interpelasi) hak yang melekat pada setiap anggota dewan,” ujar dia.
Disinggung mengenai keberadaan TAP dan TAJJ dalam roda pemerintahannya Gubernur Ridwan Kamil saat ini, Bucky menilai, TAP ini bukan merupakan tim teknis dan direkrut gubernur hanya sekedar memberikan saran kepada gubernur mengenai arah pembangunan. TAP pun bukan berasal dari aparatur sipil negara (ASN).
“Kemudian TAJJ. Nah apakah TAJJ ini merupakan turunan atau bukan?Tapi informasinya, saya sempat berbincang juga dengan Prof Asep Warlan, katanya tidak ada hubungan struktural antara TAP dan TAJJ. Jadi apakah bisa dibubarkan (TAP dan TAJJ), ya bisa saja. Karena itu kan menggunakan keputusan gubernur. Tinggal gubernur mau tidak membubarkannya?,” ucap dia.***

The Existence of the West Java Development and Acceleration Team Must Be Evaluated by the Governor of West Java
Nov 04 2019, 08:11 by Ecep Sukirman
BANDUNG, (PR) .- The existence of the Development Acceleration Team (TAP) and the West Java Champion Acceleration Team (TAJJ) formed by Governor Ridwan Kamil, must be evaluated. This is in line with the emergence of the interpellation issue that is rolling in the West Java Regional House of Representatives (DPRD) today.
This was stated by West Java DPRD member Bucky Wibawa Karya Guna after holding a public discussion on Jalan Tubagus Ismail VIII Bandung, Monday, November 4, 2019. Public discussions that were originally held with several West Java DPRD members such as the Chairperson of the West Java DPRD Democratic Party Faction Asep Wahyuwijaya, Chairperson of the Indonesian Unity Nasdem Faction Tia Fitriani, Deputy Chairperson of the West Java DPRD By Soleh, including the West Java TAP Daily Chair Arfi Rafnialdi, was only attended by a few speakers.
The absence of other resource persons from the West Java DPRD was allegedly unable to attend, as was the Daily Chairperson of West Java TAP. The discussion was held related to the discourse on the use of interpellation rights in the West Java DPRD which highlighted the performance of West Java Governor Ridwan Kamil, including the existence of TAP and TAJJ who were recruited in running the Ridwan Kamil government.
"If on the way there happens to be a kind of distortion in the duties of the TAP and TAJJ, for example there are findings on the ground that there is an abuse of authority, I don't think we will hesitate to convey that to the governor. I think (the existence of the TAP and TAJJ) the governor must indeed be evaluated by raising the issue of interpellation, "said Bucky.
Mentioned about the seriousness of the West Java DPRD using its interpretation rights to the Governor of West Java, Bucky admitted that he did not know in detail about it. He reasoned he was a member of the new West Java DPRD, while this interpellation issue had been rolling for the past 1 year of the West Java DPRD for the 2014-2019 period.
"So if I am still new (serving West Java Parliament) and must first trace the root of the problem from the past period until now. If it involves TAP and TAJJ issues, so yes we also have to study first. I don't know if that is just a discourse or it will be rolled out. Because that's right (interpellation rights) the rights inherent in each board member, "he said.
Mentioned about the existence of the TAP and TAJJ in the wheel of his government Governor Ridwan Kamil at this time, Bucky considered, this TAP was not a technical team and was recruited by the governor merely to provide advice to the governor regarding the direction of development. The TAP did not originate from the state civil service (ASN).
"Then TAJJ. Now is TAJJ derived or not? But the information, I also had a chance to talk with Prof. Asep Warlan, he said, there is no structural relationship between TAP and TAJJ. So can it be dissolved (TAP and TAJJ), yes it can. Because it uses the governor's decision. Just the governor wants to disband it ?, "he said. ***
